body:
Hi, so I finally decided to update my profile on the forums only to find out that every time I put my steam link into the social media thing it regects it saying that it
  • Was too long, 36 letters max
  • There were invalid letters and symbols
Any help would be greatly appreciated :) 


Sorry for bad spellings but its 12 in the morning right now :P

title: Steam/account help!
